Title: Relates to creating the solar panel purchasing revolving loan program
Summary: Creates the solar panel purchasing revolving loan program using funds from the general debt services fund.
LawSection: New York State Financial Emergency Act for the City of NY
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 868 of the laws of 1975, constituting the New York state financial emergency act for the city of New York, in relation to creating the solar panel purchasing revolving loan program
